verbose_text: Specifically, Iri9 -/- NK cells showed higher expression of Clec2i, which encodes Clr-g, a ligand for the activating receptor NKRP1f, and lower expression of several MHC class I molecules, including H2-t23, encoding the MHC class Ib molecule Qa-1b, which is critical for protecting activated T cells from lysis by NKG2A + NK cells.
